messages.subject: To those in LA (Louisianna, not Cali)
messages.msgSnippet: I read a post from someone in LA considering a move, but can t seem to locate the post again. I ve been working this week, so I don t have much time and my
messages.messageBody:
I read a post from someone in LA considering a move, but can't seem to locate the post again. I've been working this week, so I don't have much time and my brain is overtaxed at this point!:)
I just wanted to put a bid out there for Pensacola. We aren't TOO far from Louisianna and I'm intent on creating an unschooling haven here....so far it's working out fairly well. Our inclusive group has several unschoolers, plus some school at homers (doh!) that are open minded. So come on over this way, we'll take ya.

Ren

Learn about unschooling at:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/unschoolingbasics/
